title: Yoshimaho (Yoshi Yoshi Magic)
synopsis: Exhausted by your daily life, you were seeking a way to heal. You wanted to be kindly praised and comforted. "Toddlers can be legally fawned over, they're so lucky..." Such thoughts were an escape from reality.
voices: ['Saitou, Souma', 'Toki, Shunichi', 'Satou, Takuya', 'Shingaki, Tarusuke', 'Masuda, Toshiki', 'Kumagai, Kentarou']
